TopicTitle: Planceception! A plane Within a plane. Thanks Spootyman for your awesome video of it

Articles.Content:
One of my favorite twitch broadcaster, Spootyman (http://www.twitch.tv/spootyman) was kind enough to feature the plane (and other of my creations) on his channel, and even made a Youtube video out of it (

). So im returning the kindness with a little publicity on his behalf.

This plane is a goofy project that, funny enough, Spooty inspired, (he often makes inception jokes) so I created Planeception. Its very easy to fly and use, and when you want to have the plane emerge out of the plane, just stage!

Two things should be known: 1- the large plane does not like abrupt braking, and 2, the small plane is very squirrely, so be cautious when landing (parachutes are installed just in case).

Here is the Planeception in action

The download file.

http://www./view/lh3soix1bd5dm1a/Planeception.craft
